mapper.select: select rownum rno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bsfile, bfile, to_char(bdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate, id from (select rownum rno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bsfile, bfile, bdate, id from (select bid, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bsfile, bfile, bdate, id from mybook_board order by bdate desc) order by bdate) where rno between (#{page}-1)*#{perPageNum}+1 and (#{page}*#{perPageNum}) order by rno desc
select substr(name, 1,1) name from mybook_member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update mybook_board set bhit=bhit+1 where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select * from mybook_comment where bid=#{bid} order by cdate
select msfile from mybook_member where id=#{id}
select count(*) from mybook_comment where bid=#{bid}
mapper.update: update mybook_board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent}, bfile=#{bfile}, bsfile=#{bsfile} where bid=#{bid}
update mybook_comment set ccontent=#{ccontent}, cdate=sysdate where cid=#{cid}
